text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  <INTRO>15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gaß sind zu verkauffen:</INTRO>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>
    <NOTE>mit viel schönen Kupfern</NOTE>
    <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1632</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>II Tomes</VOLUME>
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1744</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1684</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Eyusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hora Hebr. in Act. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Jena</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1727</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>In Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. V. Test.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1733</YEAR>
    <VOLUME>11 Tomi</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>50 Karten</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"1. Wrapped the introductory free text into an <INTRO> element to separate it from the first <BIBL> entry.
2. Re-encoded broken UTF-8 sequences (e.g. "Ga√¼" ➔ "Gaß"; "sch√∂nen" ➔ "schönen").
3. Added a <NOTE> element for the phrase "mit viel schönen Kupfern" so that it is no longer loose text inside <BIBL>.
4. Turned the malformed element <TITLE=in Pentateuch. …> into a proper <TITLE> element.
5. Escaped the ampersand inside that title ( &  ➔  & ).
6. Normalised obvious OCR/encoding noise in <VOLUME> values ("IT." ➔ "II"; removed trailing punctuation).
7. Added missing <FORMAT> element to the Rollin entry and fixed wrong value "8v6" ➔ "8vo"; harmonised "4t√≤" ➔ "4to".
8. Removed stray commas/periods that were outside of any element but inside <BIBL>, ensuring all character data now sits within elements."}

<ITEM>
  <INTRO>15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gaß sind zu verkauffen:</INTRO>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>
    <NOTE>mit viel schönen Kupfern</NOTE>
    <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1632</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>II Tomes</VOLUME>
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1744</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1684</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Eyusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hora Hebr. in Act. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Jena</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1727</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>In Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. V. Test.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1733</YEAR>
    <VOLUME>11 Tomi</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>50 Karten</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Wrapped the introductory free text into an <INTRO> element to separate it from the first <BIBL> entry.
2. Re-encoded broken UTF-8 sequences (e.g. "Ga√¼" ➔ "Gaß"; "sch√∂nen" ➔ "schönen").
3. Added a <NOTE> element for the phrase "mit viel schönen Kupfern" so that it is no longer loose text inside <BIBL>.
4. Turned the malformed element <TITLE=in Pentateuch. …> into a proper <TITLE> element.
5. Escaped the ampersand inside that title ( &  ➔  & ).
6. Normalised obvious OCR/encoding noise in <VOLUME> values ("IT." ➔ "II"; removed trailing punctuation).
7. Added missing <FORMAT> element to the Rollin entry and fixed wrong value "8v6" ➔ "8vo"; harmonised "4t√≤" ➔ "4to".
8. Removed stray commas/periods that were outside of any element but inside <BIBL>, ensuring all character data now sits within elements.
